nodes.text: Chompers the Undying was the trained K'lor'slug of Conraad Om'wurt, a gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Conraad was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger" and was defeated in the fourth round of the Arena fights along with Chompers.
Chompers the Undying appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as part of the fourth boss fight of "Eternal Championship".
